name: The Roach Collector
description:
The Roach Collector

  • Third-person shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world.
  • Stealth elements
  • Roguelike Mechanics. You die then you lose everything
  • Hideout: Use the hideout to buy better equipment and stash away items in case you die. 
  • Bosses: Each level contains a boss, you must defeat the boss to progress to the next level
  • Leave a level at any time: You can leave a level by going back to the start of it. This lets you escape with valuables and come back with better equipment.

IN DEVELOPMENT

Future features:

  • More levels (currently two levels)
  • More reactant AI
  • Different types of ammunition such as incendiary and explosive rounds.
